name: YouTube 3.0 Revert to White [DEPRECIATED]
description:
Youtube broke everything again, please wait for a revised version.
White background! Blue video links! Classic shiny logo!
This theme restores everything that made YouTube 2.0 so warm and fuzzy. It introduces many subtle UI changes that take you back to that good old Classic YouTube feel!
And now it hides those nasty unrelated "Featured Videos" and paid viral "Promoted Videos".

List of changes:

Changes Background Color from Gray to White
Restores the old YouTube logo to complement the white background.
Restores Comment color from gray to black and Link colors from gray to blue.
Brings back that massive View Counter!
Removes those unrelated "Featured Videos" and paid "Promoted Videos" at the top of your suggestions bar.


Yep. Hope you like it!
Current Release v0.15 - Regularly Updated, add your suggestions or feedback in the comments~ :D
additional_info: I recommend Adblock Plus for Firefox/Aurora/Nightly and Adblock for Chrome/Chromium to remove those awful 2 minute YouTube video ads and site banners. Works like a charm~ 2012.11.07 v0.15 fixed color on the Add To, Transcript, Share and Like/Dislike slideout box. 2012.06.14 v0.14a fixed text colors on inline share dialog and add to playlists/favorites prompt, fixed username colors on the homepage, code optimized 2012.06.14 v0.14 updated to counteract YouTube's stylesheet changes, now removes featured videos and promoted videos 2011.12.04 v0.06 fixed text colors on the inline video settings dialog 2011.12.03 v0.05b fixed text colors on the video upload page 2011.12.03 v0.05a restored the formatting on the front page stream a bit, it looks akin to version 2.0 now 2011.12.03 v0.05 changes comment, description and username color from gray to black 2011.12.03 v0.04 replaces youtube logo with the 2.0 one. blends better than the current one imo. 2011.12.03 v0.03 fixed link colors for sidebar vids back to blue, fixed some text discrepancies because of white background 2011.12.01 v0.02a slimmed down the code to 6 lines, 11 with spacing and stuff, because I didn't need the rest, lol, i suck at CSS. xD 2011.12.01 v0.02 ok, fixed. everything works now. :D 2011.12.01 v0.01a noobish last minute edit, i'm still figuring out CSS lol. 2011.12.01 v0.01 initial release, changes BG color from gray to white.
